title: Biden says Twitter spews lies across the world
description: US President Joe Biden said on Friday that Elon Musk had purchased a social media platform in Twitter that spews lies across the world. Biden said at a fundraiser: "And now what are we all worried about: Elon Musk goes out and buys an outfit that sends - that spews lies all across the world... There’s no editors anymore in America. There’s no editors. How do we expect kids to be able to understand what is at stake?"
